services.title: Global Sourcing & Export
services.description: We source the finest spices directly from farms across India and export them to global markets with full documentation support.

services.title: Logistics & Shipping
services.description: Our expert logistics team ensures timely and secure delivery of your consignments via air or sea freight.

services.title: Quality Control
services.description: Rigorous quality checks at every stage, from procurement to packaging, to guarantee premium quality.

services.title: Customs Clearance
services.description: Navigate complex customs regulations with ease. We handle all documentation and compliance for smooth trade operations.

services.title: Custom Packaging
services.description: Secure and customized packaging to preserve freshness and meet international standards.

services.title: Dedicated Support
services.description: Expert support for all your trade and logistics needs, available 24/7.

testimonials.name: Priya Sharma
testimonials.title: Head Chef
testimonials.content: The quality of spices from SD Overseas is unmatched. They have become an integral part of our restaurant's supply chain.

testimonials.name: Rajesh Kumar
testimonials.title: Owner
testimonials.content: SD Overseas' logistics and timely delivery have been crucial for our retail business. Their spices are a customer favorite.

testimonials.name: Anjali Mehta
testimonials.title: Procurement Manager
testimonials.content: Working with SD Overseas has been a pleasure. Their professional team ensures everything runs smoothly, from order to delivery.

testimonials.name: Marcus Johnson
testimonials.title: Executive Chef
testimonials.content: SD Overseas has transformed our kitchen operations with their consistent quality and excellent logistics. The spices arrive fresh and aromatic every time.

testimonials.name: Emily Chen
testimonials.title: Import Manager
testimonials.content: Working with SD Overseas has significantly improved our supply chain efficiency. Their documentation and customs clearance support is exceptional.

testimonials.name: Ahmed Hassan
testimonials.title: Restaurant Owner
testimonials.content: The authenticity and freshness of spices from SD Overseas is unmatched. Our customers always compliment the rich flavors in our dishes.

testimonials.name: Sarah Williams
testimonials.title: Quality Manager
testimonials.content: SD Overseas' rigorious quality control ensures we receive only the finest spices. Their testing and certification process gives us complete confidence.

testimonials.name: David Kim
testimonials.title: Purchasing Director
testimonials.content: The variety and quality of spices from SD Overseas has helped us expand our menu offerings. Their sourcing network across India is impressive.

testimonials.name: Lisa Rodriguez
testimonials.title: Operations Manager
testimonials.content: SD Overseas' packaging and shipping solutions are top-notch. Our spices arrive in perfect condition, maintaining their potency and aroma.

testimonials.name: Michael Thompson
testimonials.title: CEO
testimonials.content: Partnering with SD Overseas has been a game-changer for our business. Their expertise in spice trading and global logistics is unmatched.

testimonials.name: Jennifer Lee
testimonials.title: Head of Procurement
testimonials.content: SD Overseas' commitment to sustainable sourcing and fair trade practices aligns perfectly with our company values. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Robert Wilson
testimonials.title: Restaurant Chain Owner
testimonials.content: With 15 locations, we need reliable suppliers. SD Overseas consistently delivers on time with exceptional quality. They're our go-to spice partner.
